codeSnippets.python:
import requests
url = "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/bulk-check"
headers = {
    "x-user-id": "YOUR_USER_ID",
    "x-secret-id": "YOUR_SECRET_ID",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
}
body = ["example1@gmail.com", "example2@gmail.com"]

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, json=body)
data = response.json()

print(data)
